title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1368/87 of 18 May 1987 concerning the classification of goods under subheading 90.28 A II a) of the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1368/87
of 18 May 1987
concerning the classification of goods under subheading 90.28 A II a) of the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the twenty-first day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 May 1987.
For the Commission
COCKFIELD
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 14, 21. 1. 1969, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 191, 19. 7. 1984, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 172, 22. 7. 1968, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 76, 18. 3. 1987, p. 1.
